casebody.data:
IN RE LOUIS G. BASSO, JR. REVOCABLE LIVING TRUST Mary Angela Basso, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Louis J. Basso, Ronald Barron, St. Louis Financial Planners, Inc., Ameriprise Financial Services, Inc., Sikich LLP, Comerica Bank, Berger, Ghersi & LaDuke PLC, Morgan Stanley Smith Barney, Stephen Johnston, Kristy Biddinger, Mark Frankel, UBS Financial Services, Inc., Thomas Brennan Fraser, and Merrill Lynch Pierce Fenner & Smith, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 159060
COA: 345962 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 3, 2019 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
